General.Name: Akg Exim Limited
General.Description: AKG Exim Limited operates in the trading business in India and internationally. It distributes non-basmati and basmati rice; metal scraps, including heavy melting, aluminum, stainless steel, copper, brass, ferrous and non-ferrous scrap, and reusable items; and spices and dry fruits. The company is also involved in engineering and technical consultancy services. In addition, it trades in petrochemicals, such as base oil, sulphur granules, bitumen, alkyl benzene, toluene, and other petroleum-based chemicals, as well as cloves and areca nuts. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Gurugram, India.
